segments.source_content:
import RemoveGlobalCLI from './\_remove-global-cli.md';
import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs'; import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem'; import constants from '@site/core/TabsConstants';

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a9b642df

segments.source_content: ## Installing dependencies

translations.zh-hant: ## 安裝依賴套件

segments.source_content: You will need Node, Watchman, the React Native command line interface, Xcode and CocoaPods.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要安裝 Node、Watchman、React Native 命令行工具、Xcode 和 CocoaPods。

segments.source_content: While you can use any editor of your choice to develop your app, you will need to install Xcode in order to set up the necessary tooling to build your React Native app for iOS.

translations.zh-hant: 雖然您可以使用任何編輯器開發應用程式，但必須安裝 Xcode 才能設置必要的工具來為 iOS 構建 React Native 應用程式。

segments.source_content: ### Node & Watchman

translations.zh-hant: ### Node 與 Watchman

segments.source_content: We recommend installing Node and Watchman using [Homebrew](http://brew.sh/). Run the following commands in a Terminal after installing Homebrew:

translations.zh-hant: 我們建議使用 [Homebrew](http://brew.sh/) 安裝 Node 和 Watchman。安裝 Homebrew 後，在終端機中執行以下命令：

segments.source_content:
```shell
brew install node
brew install watchman
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5564d81d

segments.source_content: If you have already installed Node on your system, make sure it is Node 16 or newer.

translations.zh-hant: 如果系統已安裝 Node，請確保版本為 16 或更新。

segments.source_content: [Watchman](https://facebook.github.io/watchman) is a tool by Facebook for watching changes in the filesystem. It is highly recommended you install it for better performance.

translations.zh-hant: [Watchman](https://facebook.github.io/watchman) 是 Facebook 開發的檔案系統變更監控工具。強烈建議安裝以獲得更好的效能。

segments.source_content: ### Xcode

translations.zh-hant: ### Xcode

segments.source_content: Please use the **latest version** of Xcode.

translations.zh-hant: 請使用 Xcode 的**最新版本**。

segments.source_content: The easiest way to install Xcode is via the [Mac App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/xcode/id497799835?mt=12). Installing Xcode will also install the iOS Simulator and all the necessary tools to build your iOS app.

translations.zh-hant: 最簡單的安裝方式是透過 [Mac App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/xcode/id497799835?mt=12)。安裝 Xcode 會同時安裝 iOS 模擬器和構建 iOS 應用程式所需的所有工具。

segments.source_content: #### Command Line Tools

translations.zh-hant: #### 命令行工具

segments.source_content: You will also need to install the Xcode Command Line Tools. Open Xcode, then choose **Settings... (or Preferences...)** from the Xcode menu. Go to the Locations panel and install the tools by selecting the most recent version in the Command Line Tools dropdown.

translations.zh-hant: 您還需要安裝 Xcode 命令行工具。打開 Xcode，從選單中選擇 **Settings... (或 Preferences...)**。進入 Locations 面板，從 Command Line Tools 下拉選單中選擇最新版本進行安裝。

segments.source_content: ![Xcode Command Line Tools](/docs/assets/GettingStartedXcodeCommandLineTools.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Xcode 命令行工具](/docs/assets/GettingStartedXcodeCommandLineTools.png)

segments.source_content: #### Installing an iOS Simulator in Xcode

translations.zh-hant: #### 在 Xcode 中安裝 iOS 模擬器

segments.source_content: To install a simulator, open **Xcode > Settings... (or Preferences...)** and select the **Platforms (or Components)** tab. Select a simulator with the corresponding version of iOS you wish to use.

translations.zh-hant: 要安裝模擬器，打開 **Xcode > Settings... (或 Preferences...)** 並選擇 **Platforms (或 Components)** 標籤頁。選擇您想使用的對應 iOS 版本模擬器。

segments.source_content: #### CocoaPods

translations.zh-hant: #### CocoaPods

segments.source_content: [CocoaPods](https://cocoapods.org/) is one of the dependency management system available for iOS. CocoaPods is a Ruby [gem](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RubyGems). You can install CocoaPods using the version of Ruby that ships with the latest version of macOS.

translations.zh-hant: [CocoaPods](https://cocoapods.org/) 是 iOS 的依賴管理工具之一。CocoaPods 是一個 Ruby [gem](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RubyGems)。您可以使用最新版 macOS 內建的 Ruby 版本安裝 CocoaPods。

segments.source_content: For more information, please visit [CocoaPods Getting Started guide](https://guides.cocoapods.org/using/getting-started.html).

translations.zh-hant: 更多資訊請參閱 [CocoaPods 入門指南](https://guides.cocoapods.org/using/getting-started.html)。

segments.source_content: ### React Native Command Line Interface

translations.zh-hant: ### React Native 命令行工具

segments.source_content: React Native has a built-in command line interface. Rather than install and manage a specific version of the CLI globally, we recommend you access the current version at runtime using `npx`, which ships with Node.js. With `npx react-native <command>`, the current stable version of the CLI will be downloaded and executed at the time the command is run.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 內建命令行工具。我們建議不要全域安裝特定版本的 CLI，而是透過 Node.js 自帶的 `npx` 在運行時存取當前版本。使用 `npx react-native <command>` 時，會自動下載並執行當前穩定版的 CLI。

segments.source_content: ## Creating a new application

translations.zh-hant: ## 建立新應用程式

segments.source_content: <RemoveGlobalCLI />

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_8e90ad3a

segments.source_content: You can use React Native's built-in command line interface to generate a new project. Let's create a new React Native project called "AwesomeProject":

translations.zh-hant: 您可以使用 React Native 內建命令行工具生成新專案。讓我們建立一個名為 "AwesomeProject" 的新 React Native 專案：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native@latest init AwesomeProject
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_f275f5fd

segments.source_content: This is not necessary if you are integrating React Native into an existing application, or if you've installed [Expo](https://docs.expo.dev/bare/installing-expo-modules/) in your project, or if you're adding iOS support to an existing React Native project (see [Integration with Existing Apps](integration-with-existing-apps.md)). You can also use a third-party CLI to init your React Native app, such as [Ignite CLI](https://github.com/infinitered/ignite).

translations.zh-hant: 如果您是將 React Native 整合到現有應用程式、專案中已安裝 [Expo](https://docs.expo.dev/bare/installing-expo-modules/)，或是為現有 React Native 專案添加 iOS 支援（參見[與現有應用程式整合](integration-with-existing-apps.md)），則無需此步驟。您也可以使用第三方 CLI（如 [Ignite CLI](https://github.com/infinitered/ignite)）初始化 React Native 應用程式。

segments.source_content:
:::info

If you are having trouble with iOS, try to reinstall the dependencies by running:

1. `cd ios` to navigate to the `ios` folder.
2. `bundle install` to install [Bundler](https://bundler.io/)
3. `bundle exec pod install` to install the iOS dependencies managed by CocoaPods.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

如果遇到 iOS 相關問題，請嘗試重新安裝依賴套件：

1. 執行 `cd ios` 進入 `ios` 資料夾
2. 執行 `bundle install` 安裝 [Bundler](https://bundler.io/)
3. 執行 `bundle exec pod install` 安裝由 CocoaPods 管理的 iOS 依賴套件

:::

segments.source_content: ### [Optional] Using a specific version or template

translations.zh-hant: ### [選用] 使用特定版本或模板

segments.source_content: If you want to start a new project with a specific React Native version, you can use the `--version` argument:

translations.zh-hant: 若想以特定 React Native 版本建立新專案，可使用 `--version` 參數：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native@X.XX.X init AwesomeProject --version X.XX.X
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_9f3b4022

segments.source_content: You can also start a project with a custom React Native template with the `--template` argument.

translations.zh-hant: 亦可透過 `--template` 參數使用自訂 React Native 模板啟動專案。

segments.source_content: > **Note** If the above command is failing, you may have old version of `react-native` or `react-native-cli` installed globally on your pc. Try uninstalling the cli and run the cli using `npx`.

translations.zh-hant: > **注意** 若上述指令執行失敗，可能是因電腦中安裝了舊版全域 `react-native` 或 `react-native-cli`。請嘗試解除安裝 CLI 後改用 `npx` 執行。

segments.source_content: ### [Optional] Configuring your environment

translations.zh-hant: ### [選用] 環境設定

segments.source_content: Starting from React Native version 0.69, it is possible to configure the Xcode environment using the `.xcode.env` file provided by the template.

translations.zh-hant: 自 React Native 0.69 版起，可透過模板提供的 `.xcode.env` 檔案設定 Xcode 環境。

segments.source_content:
The `.xcode.env` file contains an environment variable to export the path to the `node` executable in the `NODE_BINARY` variable.
This is the **suggested approach** to decouple the build infrastructure from the system version of `node`. You should customize this variable with your own path or your own `node` version manager, if it differs from the default.

translations.zh-hant:
`.xcode.env` 檔案包含用於在 `NODE_BINARY` 變數中導出 `node` 執行路徑的環境變數。
此為**建議做法**，可將建置基礎設施與系統版 `node` 解耦。若預設值不符需求，應依自身路徑或 Node 版本管理工具自訂此變數。

segments.source_content: On top of this, it's possible to add any other environment variable and to source the `.xcode.env` file in your build script phases. If you need to run script that requires some specific environment, this is the **suggested approach**: it allows to decouple the build phases from a specific environment.

translations.zh-hant: 此外，還可添加其他環境變數，並在建置指令階段引入 `.xcode.env` 檔案。若需執行依賴特定環境的指令碼，此為**建議做法**：能讓建置階段與特定環境解耦。

segments.source_content:
:::info
If you are already using [NVM](http://nvm.sh/) (a command which helps you install and switch between versions of Node.js) and [zsh](https://ohmyz.sh/), you might want to move the code that initialize NVM from your `~/.zshrc` into a `~/.zshenv` file to help Xcode find your Node executable:

```zsh
export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"
[ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"  # This loads nvm
```

You might also want to ensure that all "shell script build phase" of your Xcode project, is using `/bin/zsh` as its shell.
:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info
若已使用 [NVM](http://nvm.sh/)（協助安裝與切換 Node.js 版本的工具）與 [zsh](https://ohmyz.sh/)，建議將初始化 NVM 的程式碼從 `~/.zshrc` 移至 `~/.zshenv` 檔案，以協助 Xcode 找到 Node 執行檔：

```zsh
export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"
[ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"  # 載入 nvm
```

同時建議確認 Xcode 專案中所有「shell 指令碼建置階段」均使用 `/bin/zsh` 作為 shell。
:::

segments.source_content: ## Running your React Native application

translations.zh-hant: ## 執行 React Native 應用程式

segments.source_content: ### Step 1: Start Metro

translations.zh-hant: ### 步驟 1：啟動 Metro

segments.source_content: First, you will need to start Metro, the JavaScript bundler that ships with React Native. Metro "takes in an entry file and various options, and returns a single JavaScript file that includes all your code and its dependencies."—[Metro Docs](https://metrobundler.dev/docs/concepts)

translations.zh-hant: 首先需啟動 Metro——React Native 內建的 JavaScript 打包工具。Metro「接收入口檔案與各項參數，回傳包含所有程式碼與依賴的單一 JavaScript 檔案」——[Metro 文件](https://metrobundler.dev/docs/concepts)

segments.source_content: To start Metro, run following command inside your React Native project folder:

translations.zh-hant: 請在 React Native 專案目錄下執行以下指令啟動 Metro：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm start
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn start
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_905803c8

segments.source_content: > If you're familiar with web development, Metro is a lot like webpack—for React Native apps. Unlike Swift or Objective-C, JavaScript isn't compiled—and neither is React Native. Bundling isn't the same as compiling, but it can help improve startup performance and translate some platform-specific JavaScript into more widely supported JavaScript.

translations.zh-hant: > 若熟悉網頁開發，Metro 類似 React Native 應用的 webpack。與 Swift 或 Objective-C 不同，JavaScript 不需編譯——React Native 亦然。打包雖非編譯，但能提升啟動效能，並將部分平台專屬 JavaScript 轉譯為更廣泛支援的 JavaScript。

segments.source_content: ### Step 2: Start your application

translations.zh-hant: ### 步驟 2：啟動應用程式

segments.source_content: Let Metro Bundler run in its own terminal. Open a new terminal inside your React Native project folder. Run the following:

translations.zh-hant: 讓 Metro Bundler 在獨立終端機中運行。另開新終端機進入專案目錄，執行：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm run ios
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn ios
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_2974c396

segments.source_content: You should see your new app running in the iOS Simulator shortly.

translations.zh-hant: 稍候即可在 iOS 模擬器中看見新應用程式運行。

segments.source_content: ![AwesomeProject on iOS](/docs/assets/GettingStartediOSSuccess.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![iOS 上的 AwesomeProject](/docs/assets/GettingStartediOSSuccess.png)

segments.source_content: This is one way to run your app. You can also run it directly from within Xcode.

translations.zh-hant: 此為執行應用程式的方式之一，亦可直接透過 Xcode 運行。

segments.source_content: > If you can't get this to work, see the [Troubleshooting](troubleshooting.md) page.

translations.zh-hant: > 若無法正常執行，請參閱[疑難排解](troubleshooting.md)頁面。

segments.source_content: ### Running on a device

translations.zh-hant: ### 在實體裝置上執行

segments.source_content: The above command will automatically run your app on the iOS Simulator by default. If you want to run the app on an actual physical iOS device, please follow the instructions [here](running-on-device.md).

translations.zh-hant: 上述指令預設會在 iOS 模擬器執行應用程式。若需在實體 iOS 裝置運行，請參照[此處](running-on-device.md)說明操作。

segments.source_content: ### Modifying your app

translations.zh-hant: ### 修改應用程式

segments.source_content: Now that you have successfully run the app, let's modify it.

translations.zh-hant: 現在您已成功運行應用程式，接下來讓我們進行修改。

segments.source_content:
- Open `App.tsx` in your text editor of choice and edit some lines.
- Hit <kbd>Cmd ⌘</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> in your iOS Simulator to reload the app and see your changes!

translations.zh-hant:
- 在您選擇的文字編輯器中打開 `App.tsx` 並編輯部分程式碼。
- 在 iOS 模擬器中按下 <kbd>Cmd ⌘</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> 重新載入應用程式，即可查看變更效果！

segments.source_content: ### That's it!

translations.zh-hant: ### 完成了！

segments.source_content: Congratulations! You've successfully run and modified your first React Native app.

translations.zh-hant: 恭喜！您已成功運行並修改了第一個 React Native 應用程式。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_0f8eff48

segments.source_content: ## Now what?

translations.zh-hant: ## 接下來呢？

segments.source_content: - If you want to add this new React Native code to an existing application, check out the [Integration guide](integration-with-existing-apps.md).

translations.zh-hant: - 若想將此 React Native 程式碼整合至現有應用程式，請參閱[整合指南](integration-with-existing-apps.md)。

segments.source_content: If you're curious to learn more about React Native, check out the [Introduction to React Native](getting-started).

translations.zh-hant: 如果想深入瞭解 React Native，請查看 [React Native 簡介](getting-started)。
